patterns: tell me more about bhuvan functionalities
responses: Bhuvan offers a wide range of features beyond this basic explanation. To explore its full potential, I recommend visiting the Bhuvan website: [https://www.nrsc.gov.in/EO_Rural_Portals?language_content_entity=en]

patterns: how to use bhuvan for mapping
responses: Bhuvan allows you to create custom maps with your preferred data layers.  For a guide on map creation, visit the Bhuvan website: [https://www.nrsc.gov.in/EO_Bhuvan_Satellite]
Bhuvan is a geospatial platform developed by ISRO. It allows you to view and download satellite imagery, maps, and other geospatial data. You can also create custom maps and applications.
For a more detailed overview, you can visit the Bhuvan website: [https://www.nrsc.gov.in/EO_Water_Objective]

patterns: how to access data on bhuvan
what kind of data is available on bhuvan
responses: Bhuvan provides access to a variety of geospatial data, including satellite imagery, maps, and elevation data. You can find information on accessing and downloading data on the Bhuvan website: [https://www.nrsc.gov.in/RD_Activities]

patterns: development of transformative index-based crop insurance solutions
village level groundwater resources assessment & management
responses: Learn about transformative index-based crop insurance solutions and how they're developed using geospatial technologies.
Discover the bio-energy potential from crop residues and how it's being explored.
Explore the concept of digital agriculture and its applications.
Understand the importance of village-level groundwater resources assessment and management.

patterns: satellite integrated landslide assessment and alert system
real-time operational spatial flood early warning for the Godavari and the Tapi Rivers
responses: Get insights into the Satellite Integrated Landslide Assessment and Alert System.
Learn about the early warning systems for flash droughts.
Understand the real-time operational spatial flood early warning systems for the Godavari and Tapi Rivers.
Explore the National Database for Emergency Management and its role in disaster management.
